recipes.title: French 75
recipes.content: Sprinkle a thin layer of sugar on a plate.  Add gin, confectioners' sugar and lemon juice; cover and shake until condensation forms on outside of shaker, 10-15 seconds.

recipes.title: Moscow Mule
recipes.content: Combine 4 cups ginger beer, 2/3 cup lime juice and 1-1/4 cups vodka in a pitcher. Serve over ice.

recipes.title: Passion Fruit Hurricanes
recipes.content: In a pitcher, combine 2 cups of passion fruit juice, 1 cup plus 2 tablespoons of sugar, 3/4 cup of lime juice, 3/4 cup of light rum, 3/4 cup of dark rum and 3 tablespoons of grenadine;
